attributes.action: A Vote of NO Confidence in the current Government
attributes.additional_details:
The Conservative Party made a manifesto pledge to by a Party for the family.

This Government is:

Stopping the Family Allowance for those who earn over the 40% Tax threshold.

Reduction in Pension Allowances.

Higher Taxes on fuel that affects all families.

The Conservative Party is doing nothing about the Euro crisis. What is the plan B when the banks stop lending and we go back into recession?

The Public sector cuts are having an adverse affect on the Private sector, jobs are being lost. What is the Government doing about it?

They have got it wrong!

A Vote of NO Confidence in the current Government is needed.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament and not the Government.
